title: Ticket #5377: Construct an AMI with HTCondor pre-installed.
description: The current approach of downloading HTCondor from our repository (and the installing it) has obvious scalability limitations. This will need to be corrected before we run our scaling tests, and the obvious way so to do is to embed HTCondor in the AMI.
remarks:
2015-Dec-01 16:46:06 by tlmiller:
An AMI that should work for all the instance types we care about has been created and seems to be working.
